p: This experiment was performed at the Ruminant Nutrition and Metabolism Research Center, Tropical Feed Resource Research and Development Center (TROFREC), Department of Animal Science, Faculty of Agriculture, Khon Kaen University, Khon Kaen, Thailand. The experimental methods and all animals were allowed by the Khon Kaen University Animal Ethics Committee, ancillary to the Ethic of Animal Experimentation of National Research Council of Thailand.
